name: Hotel Bologna Airport

reviews.text: We booked here because we had an early flight. It was as described on the website we used, so there were no surprises. Situated just outside the city - no catering facilities midafternoon - the closest was a McDonalds in a shopping centre about 1km away. The window shutters didn't work. Room was clean and tidy. Evening restaurant quiet - one other diner. Breakfast quiet - 1 other (different!) diner.
reviews.title: Past its prime

description: Hotel Bologna Airport is a 4 star hotel with the ideal logistical support for the many business trips to Bologna, since it is located at 3.5 km from the International Airport Guglielmo Marconi and offers a large and comfortable parking area. Located directly on the Via Emilia,in the heart of the industrial hub of Bologna, only 500 m from the tollgate of Borgo Panigale and 400 m from the highway entrance/exit.Why choose Hotel Bologna Airport?For its large parking; in Bologna,not everyone offers a large parking area to its guests with over 200 parking spaces and a garage with 100 parking spaces.The proposal Park and fly and Park, sleep and fly; based on the capacity of the parking area and the good location, we can offer exceptional proposals to sleep and to leave the car during your flights from Bologna.The shuttle service to and from Bologna Marconi Airport.The meetings and conferences center consisting of 5 modular and multi-purpose meeting rooms respond perfectly to this special demand, all with daily light. The Hotel Bologna Airport with 143 rooms is suitable for everyone's needs, as well as for groups that request special rates.The excellent restaurant which offers you the pleasures of traditional Emilian cuisine.The american bar; Great for a drink in good company, when you return tired after a business meeting, or to toast to a new agreement. An excellent reference point also for a coffee break during your meetings.
